title: Blended Learning-Based Civic Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic awareness of social issues and experience using digital devices (smartphones)
context.additional_context: Implements project-based blended learning in smartphone-centered limited technical environments while fostering collaborative learning environments leveraging learners' social experiences and expertise

learning_goals: Design and execute social projects by combining digital and face-to-face activities in a 3:7 ratio in a blended learning environment.
Apply technology tool selection strategies (traditional-technology spectrum) according to learner characteristics with over 80% situational appropriateness.
Develop three or more solutions for local community issues using PBL methods and create implementation plans.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
